description:
- "Why not try being honest with your own feelings, Aoi?" "My own feelings…" -
During a brief break, Ren and his friends decide to see a fireworks show.
Aoi is overcome by a feeling she can`t put into words when she sees the mood being set between Ren and Mana, but Napoleon and Nostradamus give her a push to be more honest with her own feelings...
